channel.title: This American Life
channel.description: This American Life is a weekly public radio show, heard by 2.2 million people on more than 500 stations. Another 2.5 million people download the weekly podcast. It is hosted by Ira Glass, produced in collaboration with Chicago Public Media, delivered to stations by PRX The Public Radio Exchange, and has won all of the major broadcasting awards.

item.title: 679: Save the Girl
item.description: People go on missions to save young girls from danger. But sometimes they get so caught up in the mission that it overshadows the girl herself.
item.author: This American Life

item.title: 678: The Wannabes
item.description: This country is crawling in presidential candidates right now and they're bumping into each other in Des Moines and yelling over each other in Miami. We hang out with them, in this weird early period of the election when they're easy to walk right up to.
item.author: This American Life

item.title: 354: Mistakes Were Made
item.description: It’s the late 1960s, and a California TV repairman named Bob sees an opportunity to help people cheat death with the new science of cryonics. But freezing dead people isn’t easy. And apologizing for the mistakes you make along the way? Even harder.
item.author: This American Life

item.title: 644: Random Acts of History
item.description: Stories about people who accidentally bump into unsettling facts of history in settings meant to teach them history. What they end up learning is very different from what they’re supposed to.
item.author: This American Life

item.title: 676: Here’s Looking at You, Kid
item.description: Adults telling kids who they are, and kids wondering — are they right?
item.author: This American Life

item.title: 675: I’m on TV??
item.description: What it's like to be momentarily big on the small screen.
item.author: This American Life

item.title: 674: Get a Spine!
item.description: Stories of people standing up for themselves, shaking off their fear, bracing themselves, and doing what they’ve been scared to do.
item.author: This American Life

item.title: 673: Left Behind
item.description: People figuring out how to move through a world in which something important has disappeared.
item.author: This American Life

item.title: 672: No Fair!
item.description: Stories of very small injustices and also one very big one.
item.author: This American Life

item.title: 671: Anything Can Be Anything
item.description: People connecting the dots that maybe should not be connected.
item.author: This American Life
